module.name: DAHDi Config
module.changelog: *13.0.25* FREEPBX-12968 *13.0.24* Include missing file *13.0.23* Fix broken edit buttons *13.0.22* Finishing touches re: Sangoma Engineering *13.0.21* Fix Wanrouter start *13.0.20* Improvements to Sangoma configurations *13.0.19* More fixes *13.0.18* FREEPBX-12761 *13.0.17* General fixes *13.0.16* FREEPBX-12569 - MFC R2 settings on Dahdi configuration module *13.0.15* FREEPBX-12423 fix display issue *13.0.14* Fix error when writing to Sangoma wanrouter files *13.0.13* FREEPBX-77776 Fix system.conf for multiple analog ranges *13.0.12* If files dont exist then dont try to read them *13.0.11* Dahdi Config should handle missing files better *13.0.10* FREEPBX-11315 *13.0.9* FREEPBX-10859 and FREEPBX-11012 permissions on /dev/* *13.0.8* FREEPBX-11012 *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10898 *13.0.6* Fixes FREEPBX-10941 and FREEPBX-10859 *13.0.5* Remove old bin scripts *13.0.4* Detect and parse WanRouter configurations correctly *13.0.3* Send error output to dev/null *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha3* Fix auto-start for DAHDi *13.0.1alpha2* Update visuals *13.0.1alpha1* Use new console framework for startup
